# activities

**Instance Property**

An ordered list of activities for the multisport workout.

## Declaration

```swift
var activities: [SwimBikeRunWorkout.Activity] { get set }
```

## Accessing workout data

- **displayName**: The name that the system uses when displaying the workout.

items.description: The name that the system uses when displaying the workout.
items.name: displayName
